chapter.title: More information and support

formalpara.title: If you need more information and support
formalpara.para: First, read this documentation! Check out the online NHibernate documentation (contains the lastest articles) and read How To Ask For Help.

chapter.para: Since this is an Open Source project which we work on in our spare time, you won't be getting any support. But if you do find a bug or have a comment, you can post it on the NHibernate forum or use the bug tracker or the development mailing list. We'll try really hard to help you out.
We love getting feedback, so don't hesitate to contact us!
